body: Totally agree with you, Ecchi kun. It's something I've been thinking for literal years now, and things still haven't changed. It sucks because the cover art is usually extremely hot too, and you'd expect some pretty hot foot fetish stuff, but...

idk why but 30% of femdom hentai manga had a girl showing her feet like she was saying "lick it" but 95% of them dont have foot licking or foot smelling.
Just an horrible clickbait :(
